answers.answer: Not much to go on..........but:Obviously if these are thyroid issues, these symptoms are most common with hyperthyroid. The kidney not so much, unless its muscle in the area.I am one of the few that loses weight when hypo. Many hypo/hyper symptoms crossover. This is where lab results help. If you have these , you can post them with the reference ranges for members insight.LM
Have you been checked for diabetes?
